lines.gurmukhi: rUp koit rUp pr soBw pr koit soBw cqurweI koit cqurweI pr vwrIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Roop Koti Roop Par Sobhaa Par Koti Sobhaa , Chaturaaee Koti Chaturaaee Par Vaareeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of beautiful faces, millions of praises over her praise and millions of wisdoms are sacrifice unto the wisdom of that woman;

lines.gurmukhi: gRXwn gun kot gun gRXwn pr vwr fwrY koit Bwg Bwg pr Dir bilhwrIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Gyaan Goun Kot Goun Gyaan Par Vaar Daarai , Koti Bhaag Bhaag Par Dhari Balihaareeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of virtuous knowledge and millions of fortunes are sacrifice unto the knowledge and fortune of that woman;

lines.gurmukhi: sIl suB lCn kotwn sIl lCn kY ljw kot ljw kY ljwiemwn mwrIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Seel Soubh Lachhan Kotaan Seel Lachhan Kai , Lajaa Kot Lajaa Kai Lajaaimaan Maareeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of praiseworthy traits associated with a well-bred, well-behaved person and millions of shames and modesties are sacrifices unto that woman;

lines.gurmukhi: pRymn piqbRqw hUM pRym Aau piqbRq kY jw kau nwQ ikMcq ktwC kY inhwrIAY ]650]
lines.transliteration_english: Prayman Patibrataa Hoon Praym Au Patibrat Kai , Jaa Kau Naad Kinchat Kataachh Kai Nihaareeai ?650?

Shabad OS B.translation: Who is looked at with even a small look of grace by the Lord for her living a life commensurate with her feminine religion and duties.  (650)
